text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.deleteTooE: This module removes the "Too Expensive!" tip on the anvil and keeps the penalty level on the item.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.fixBlocksO: This module fixes the blocks' outline shape and syncs it to the blocks' model.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.fixZombieR: This module fixes the zombie reinforcement and allows zombies and their variants to spawn clones of themselves, just like Minecraft 1.21.2 version does.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.retainBloc: This module retains the original interactive range of the blocks based on the fixBlocksOutlineShape module.
If all sub functions of the fixBlocksOutlineShape module are not enabled, the module will be useless.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.title: Zakuro - Config
